metadata.name: Ten Divine Providences
metadata.description:
Ten Divine Providences
Collection: Guidance
by Fábio Nishikata
2022

Sculpture made with reference to the Ten Divine Providences of the Tenrikyo Church.

The Providences uses elements of nature (water, earth, fire and air), animals and cardinal points to represent divine actions in the conduct of events on Earth.

Digital Sculpture
Video size: 1728×2160


Edition: 1 of 1


Fábio Nishikata
